attrib.max_augment: Your augmentation modifier is higher than 4. A maximum of 4 is applied to your Attribute.

edge_boost.add_edge_pool: Add Edge to your dice pool
edge_boost.count_2_glitch: Count 2s as glitches for the target
edge_boost.heal_1_stun: Heal one box of Stun damage

label.name: Name
label.speed_detail: You are moving with {speed} km/h ({speedPerTurn} Meter per turn). Your modifier for checks is {modifier}.

backdoor_entry.name: Backdoor Entry
backdoor_entry.hint: Gain Admin access to a host or device the sneaky way. First, do a successful Probe action and add the net hits as a bonus to this dice pool.

brute_force.name: Brute Force
brute_force.hint: Attempt to get quick access by spamming a target. When trying to switch from outsider to admin directly, the enemy gets two bonus dice and plus four Defense Rating - In any way the device will be alarmed.

calibration.name: Calibration
calibration.hint: Add one to the Matrix Initiative of you and your team mates (sharing an AR-feed with your PAN) for every two hits you get. The total increase of a Persona can't be higher than your Data Processing.

change_icon.name: Change Icon
change_icon.hint: Select an Icon and replace it with another one. This won't prevent you to be tracked down, if someone attempts to.

check_os.name: Check OS
check_os.hint: Have a look at your Overwatch Score. Ironically this action also increases your OS.

control_device.name: Control Device
control_device.hint: Take control of a device as if you are the owner, until you leave the device willingly, shut it down or someone else pushes you out of control.

crack_file.name: Crack File
crack_file.hint: Make an encrypted file readable with this action.

crash_program.name: Crash Program
crash_program.hint: Check out what programs your opponent's device is running with a Matrix Perception, then take this action to shut it down.

data_spike.name: Dataspike
data_spike.hint: This is the standard attack for dealing Matrix damage to a device or persona.

disarm_data_bomb.name: Disarm Data Bomb
disarm_data_bomb.hint: With this, you can disarm Data Bombs that you detected with Matrix Perception. If you fail to achieve net hits, the Data Bomb blows up.

device_lock.name: Device Lock
device_lock.hint: Prevent the owner of a device to cut off the connection of a device to the Matrix for the duration of net hit combat rounds. Can be prolonged one time by spending a minor action.

denial_of_service.name: Denial of Service
denial_of_service.hint: Create a dice penalty for all tests using this wifi device by net hits times two.

delayed_command.name: Delayed Command
delayed_command.hint: Send a command to a device with a time frame. On success, the device will acknowledge it as being sent from it's owner. After the time frame expired, the command will be executed, even when the device was cut off from the Matrix. A reboot before execution however, will delete the command.

edit_file.name: Edit File
edit_file.hint: Add, edit, copy or delete a file with this action. During a combat, adding or changing a file needs an action for each detail. Encrypted files can't be copied.

encrypt_file.name: Encrypt File
encrypt_file.hint: This makes a file unreadable without decrypting it first. The Encryption Rating is equal to the hits of this roll.

enter_host.name: Enter/Exit Host
enter_host.hint: Get into or leave a host.

erase_matrix_signature.name: Erase Matrix Sign
erase_matrix_signature.hint: If you have a Resonance rating, remove a Matrix signature left by a technomancer or sprite with this action.

format_device.name: Format Device
format_device.hint: You replace the boot sector of this device with your own code, so it won't start anymore whenever it is told to reboot.

full_matrix_defense.name: Full Matrix Defense
full_matrix_defense.hint: Add your Firewall to all defense tests that are related to the Matrix.

garbage_in_out.name: Garbage In/Garbage Out
garbage_in_out.hint: Mess around with the input and output signals of a device. For example, every time the owner wants to start a program, the last taken picture is deleted instead.

hash_check.name: Hash Check
hash_check.hint: Search for encrypted files with a specific content in a host or device. Chances increase significantly by having a hash value.

hide.name: Hide
hide.hint: Try to make a target lose sight to you in the Matrix. Does not work if the icon has User or Admin access to any device of your network.

jack_out.name: Jack Out
jack_out.hint: Disconnect from the Matrix by rebooting your device. If you are link-locked, the opponent will roll against you. If you did not switch to AR first, you'll get damage by dump-shock.

jam_signals.name: Jam Signals
jam_signals.hint: While you are not using this device for other actions, this will increase the noise rating by any hits you have within a range of 100 meters.

jump_rigged.name: Jump Into Rigged Device
jump_rigged.hint: The vehicle or drone you want to jump into needs a rigger adaption and you need a control rig. You can only jump in, if no one else is. Your ownership and access level also factor in if this will work or not and if you need to roll.

known_exploit.name: Known Exploit Backdoor Entry
known_exploit.hint: Try to use known exploits to get direct Admin access. Your chance of succeeding is decreased on well patched hosts or devices. This combines the Probe and Backdoor Entry actions into one. You can't get or use Edge for this action while the opponent gets one temporary Edge for free to oppose you.

masquerade.name: Masquerade
masquerade.hint: You can pretend being someone else in the Matrix for net hit minutes. However it's hard to trick the Matrix and this won't work for things like taking ownership of devices or banking.

matrix_perception.name: Matrix Perception
matrix_perception.hint: Find an icon that runs silent or collect information about a target, like it's icon and device rating, running devices, programs and other specific information.

matrix_search.name: Matrix Search
matrix_search.hint: Scan the public Matrix for information about a subject.

metahuman_middle.name: Metahuman in the Middle
metahuman_middle.hint: Make all Matrix communications and actions run through your device for net hit minutes.

modify_icon.name: Modify Icon
modify_icon.hint: Modify an Icon that you have Admin access for to something, that it does not represent, like making your gun look like flowers.

probe.name: Probe
probe.hint: Try to find an exploit and use the Backdoor Entry action afterwards to get access. This takes some time, but in contrast to Brute Force, this won't alarm the target.

pop_up.name: Popup
pop_up.hint: Spam your opponent with ARO windows, so they can't spend Edge for net hit rounds as they are distracted.

reboot_device.name: Reboot Device
reboot_device.hint: This will cut off a device from the Matrix by forcing it to reboot. It will be online again by the end of the following combat round.

reconfigure.name: Reconfigure Matrix Attribute
reconfigure.hint: Switch two base ratings from your Matrix Persona that are higher than 0, regardless of the source (commlink, cyberjack, etc.) they are coming from.

send_message.name: Send Message
send_message.hint: Deliver audio or text to somebody else, or create a live feed to them.

set_data_bomb.name: Set Data Bomb
set_data_bomb.hint: Attach a Data Bomb to blow up careless hackers. The rating can be up to the maximum net hits you got. Then choose, if the Data Bomb deletes the file or not.

snoop.name: Snoop
snoop.hint: Get your hands on data traffic that is exchanged between your target and the Matrix.

spoof_command.name: Spoof Command
spoof_command.hint: Send a command to a device pretending that you are the legitimate owner. As normal, the device then attempts to perform the action as its next available major action.

squelch.name: Squelch
squelch.hint: Hinder the target from sending messages or calling someone for net hit rounds.

subvert_infrastructure.name: Subvert Infrastructure
subvert_infrastructure.hint: Make a group of similar, simple, devices of one host do what you want, like turning off street lights or rotate all security cameras to the left.

switch_ifmode.name: Switch Interface Mode
switch_ifmode.hint: Toggle between the AR and VR mode(s) of your interface.

tarpit.name: Tarpit
tarpit.hint: Slow down your target by making some damage and reducing it's data processing value.

threat_analysis.name: Threat Analysis
threat_analysis.hint: Mark harmfull entities and share them by AR Feed to your team mates, so they get your succcesses as bonus dice on their defense roll. Works for the physical world as well as for the Matrix.

trace_icon.name: Trace Icon
trace_icon.hint: Track down the physical location of a device or persona.

virtual_aim.name: Virtual Aim
virtual_aim.hint: Gives you one bonus dice for your attack actions like Data Spike or Tarpit. Can be activated once per round, but sums up each round unless you don't do another Virtual Aim action or attack. Maximum is your Willpower.

watchdog.name: Watchdog
watchdog.hint: Allows you to stalk and anticipate the actions of a Matrix persona or device during net hit rounds, so that you can intervene. Having the Watchdog active allows you to execute the Threat Analysis as a minor action.

newitem.complexform: How complex do you like it?
newitem.sin: Who are you? Who, who, who, who

baby_monitor.name: Baby Monitor
baby_monitor.desc: Tells you your current Overwatch Score without needing an action.

browse.name: Browse
browse.desc: When doing Matrix searches, gain 1 Edge that is either spent immediately on that action or disappears.

configurator.name: Configurator
configurator.desc: Store alternate deck configuration, swap to it instead of changing two attributes.

edit.name: Edit
edit.desc: When doing Edit File action, gain 1 Edge that must be immediately spent or else it vanishes.

encryption.name: Encryption
encryption.desc: +2 dice when doing Encrypt File action

virtual_machine.name: Virtual Machine
virtual_machine.desc: 2 extra program slots; take 1 extra box of unresisted Matrix damage when attacked

biofeedback.name: Biofeedback
biofeedback.desc: Causes Stun (if target is in cold-sim) or Physical (if target is in hot-sim) damage with Matrix attack. This program is linked to the Attack attribute.

biofeedback_filter.name: Biofeedback Filter
biofeedback_filter.desc: Allow Device Rating or Body roll to soak Matrix damage.

blackout.name: Blackout
blackout.desc: Like Biofeedback, but Stun damage only. This program is linked to the Attack attribute.

defuse.name: Defuse
defuse.desc: Allow Device Rating or Body roll to soak damage from Data Bomb.

exploit.name: Exploit
exploit.desc: Reduce Defense Rating of hacking target by 2.

fork.name: Fork
fork.desc: Hit two targets with a single Matrix action without splitting dice pools.

lockdown.name: Lockdown
lockdown.desc: Cause link-lock when you do Matrix damage.

overclock.name: Overclock
overclock.desc: Add two dice to a Matrix action. One of them must be the wild die.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.desc: When performing a Hide action, gain 1 Edge that must be spent as part of the action or vanish. This program is linked to the Sleaze attribute.

trace.name: Trace
trace.desc: When performing a Trace Icon action, gain 1 Edge that must be spent as part of the action or vanish. This program is linked to the Sleaze attribute.

roll.create: Create your own Shadowrun Dice Pool
roll.cantDodgeBullets: Increase threshold by circumstances after setting distance

edge.gain_player_capped: {name} would {value} Edge, but cannot get more than {capped}

roll.failedDefense: You got hit and now it is going to hurt
roll.subject: Chatmessage
roll.successfulSoak: You managed to ignore the damage

maxEdgePerRound.hint: Defines the maximum egde a player or NPC can gain per turn.
maxEdgePerRound.name: Maximum Edge earned per turn

importToCompendium.hint: Define if imported NPCs should be added as actors or as entries to the NPCs compendium
importToCompendium.name: Import to compendium

defaultThreshold.hint: Defines the default threshold used for any skill check
defaultThreshold.name: Default Threshold

hardDiceCap.hint: In standard play, there is a maximum of 20 dice for any test. No combination of abilities, skills, effects, or augments can exceed this limit during a roll. Exception: Pre-edging a test allows you to exceed the 20-dice cap with the bonus dice granted by Edge.
hardDiceCap.name: Hard Dice Cap

bleeding.hint: Use this rule to represent ongoing damage stemming from serious injuries. (SWC p.145)
bleeding.name: Bleeding

hackSlashMatrix.hint: Enable to show Matrix Actions from the Hack & Slash rulebook on character sheets. (HS p.28)
hackSlashMatrix.name: Hack & Slash Matrix Actions

armorLessensDmg.hint: Use this rule to reduce the amount of physical damage suffered. After resisting damage (from other sources than toxins or statuses), convert one box of Physical damage to Stun for every 8 full points of DR you have. (SWC p.149)
armorLessensDmg.name: Armor Lessens Physical Damage

rollStrengthCombat.hint: Close Combat attacks may roll Strength instead of Agility for any unarmed attacks or if the weapon relies on both mass and momentum. When using this, add Agility to Attack Rating in place of Strength. When relevant to the weapon, it must be wielded in both hands. (SWC p.150)
rollStrengthCombat.name: Rolling Strength Instead Of Agility In Close Combat

highStrengthAddsDamage.hint: If your Strength is at least 7, increase your melee DV by 1. If your Strength is 10 or higher, increase your melee DV by 2. Weapons that do not benefit from high strength do not increase DV. (SWC p.150)
highStrengthAddsDamage.name: High Strength Adds To Damage

highStrengthReducesRecoil.hint: The AR penalties for firing mode attacks are lessened by 1 if the attackerâ€™s strength is 7 or higher, and by 2 at 10 strength or higher. Both hands must be used to control the firearm. (SWC p.150)
highStrengthReducesRecoil.name: High Strength Reduces Recoil

cantDodgeBullets.hint: Any Opposed test for an attack is instead a Simple test against a threshold that is set by distance and the size of the target defensepool. The target of the attack may still use Edge Boosts against the attacker's dice. (SWC p.151)
cantDodgeBullets.name: You Can't Dodge Bullets

notifications.You_are_not_owner_of_the_target: You are not owner of the target.
notifications.You_are_not_owner_of_the_token: You are not owner of the token.
notifications.You_can_only_choose_Wide_Burst_when_you_: You can only choose Wide Burst when you target (T) two tokens.
notifications.Target_or_select_a_token_before_rolling: Target or select a token before rolling.
notifications.Select_a_token_first: Select a token first, or configure your Player Character actor in your User Configuration.
notifications.two_targets_but_wrong_fire_mode: You have two targets, so you can only fire using Burst Fire: Wide Burst, or using Full Auto mode.
notifications.many_targets_but_not_autofire_fire_mode: You have more than two targets, so you can only fire using Full Auto mode.
notifications.attack_with_no_AR: You're trying to attack while your Attack Rating is 0, e.g. due to distance.
notifications.Target_is_not_a_life_form: Target is not a life form.
notifications.do_not_revert_damage: Overflow into Physical monitor. Do not revert back this damage via chat button, as it won't calculate correctly.
notifications.No_actor_or_tokens_selected: Assign yourself a Player Character, or select tokens before rolling.
notifications.You_are_not_owner_of_the_tokens: You are not owner of the selected tokens.
notifications.no_weapon_skill_set: Please edit the weapon to assign a linked skill, before rolling.
notifications.only_owner_is_allowed_to_spend_edge: Only the characters owner is allowed to spend edge on this edge boost.
notifications.owner_not_logged_in: Edge Boost is not possible, e.g. due to person who rolled the test not being online.
notifications.edge_boost_is_not_post_edge: '{boostTitle}' is no post roll edge boost
notifications.you_require_more_edge: Not enough Edge available. You require {edge} more to perform this boost.
notifications.no_die_with_a_1_or_4: Your roll does not have a 1 or 4, so this Edge Boost is not useful.
notifications.cant_increase_die: You can't increase this die with this Edge Boost, as it would be without use.
notifications.character_has_spent_edge: {actor} has spent {edge} edge on the Edge Boost {edgeBoost}.
notifications.reroll_failed_requires_index: Select one or more dice before clicking on the `Spend` button.
notifications.edge_boost_cannot_be_used_glitch: This Edge Boost cannot be used if a glitch or critical glitch is rolled.
notifications.reopen_dice_tooltip: You switched selected tokens. Re-open the dice section in the chat to perform an Edge Boost.
notifications.extended_test_validation: When performing an Extended Test, Threshold and Interval must be 0 or larger.

migration.start: System migration is in progress. Do not close or refresh the window!

notifications.wrong_import_file: Cannot import a GENESIS or COMMLINK save file! Use the FoundryVTT JSON Export instead.

statblock_import.error: Something went wrong importing the NPC Statblock. Use a different PDF reader or your PDF might not be supported.
statblock_import.success: Your `{actor}` statblock was imported into the

notifications.not_enough_ammo: You don't have enough ammunition in your weapon. Change your firing mode, or reload your weapon first.
notifications.character_has_reloaded: {character} has reloaded their {weaponName} weapon with {ammoType} ammo.
notifications.character_has_switched_ammo: {character} has switched the ammo loaded in their {weaponName} weapon to {ammoType}.
notifications.character_has_changed_edge: {character} has changed their Edge manually from {oldEdge} to {edge}
notifications.bind_control_group: You have bound the selected tokens to Control Group {controlGroup}.
notifications.select_control_group: You have selected the Control Group {controlGroup} tokens.
notifications.form_grunt_group: You have formed a Grunt Group with the selected Tokens.
notifications.dismantle_grunt_group: You have dismantled the Grunt Group of the selected Tokens.
notifications.form_grunt_group_failed: The selected tokens were not valid for a Grunt Group. They must not have "Link Actor Data" enabled in their Token Configuration.
notifications.grunt_group_takes_two: You need more than one Token selected to form a Grunt Group.

dice.wild_ignored: Hit cancelled due to a 1 rolled while rolling with a Wild Die.
dice.extended_success: In total {timePassed} {intervalScale} passed, and you succeeded with your task.
dice.extended_failure: In total {timePassed} {intervalScale} passed, but you failed at your task.

extended.desc: In total {timePassed} {intervalScale} passed, and you have {hits} hits in total.

legwork.legwork_description: How much does {name} know or can find out via their network?
legwork.loyalty_description: How willing is {name} to share what they know or can find out with you?
legwork.payformore: Â«You know, I've got expenses that I need to cover. For some extra nuyen I can help you with more information..Â»

results.2: A few nuggets of information gleaned from casual study.
results.3: Information from previous coursework or loose professional knowledge.
results.4: More esoteric knowledge, some whispers of gossip.
results.5: Deep academic familiarity, strong professional knowledge, behind-the-scenes familiarity.
results.6: Knowledge of secrets and hidden information.
results.7: High-level information, solid understanding of history.
results.8: Almost encyclopedic knowledge, including some deep secrets.
results.9: Rare knowledge only available to a select few.
results.10: Deep secrets others actively try to hide.

effect.Label: Effects
effect.CantDelete: You can only delete this effect from it's Item.

active_effect.explanation: Active Effects can modify attribute modifiers and pools of your character or item. Please open a Feature Request ticket if you miss an automation needed for a Shadowrun item.

usage_tips.1: In general, use a Modifier key to adjust an Attribute, Pool or Rating.
usage_tips.2: Only use a Pool key if you need to Override a complete attribute, like with Cyberlimbs or Skillwires.
usage_tips.3: As normal in Shadowrun 6E, Attribute Modifiers are automatically capped at +4.

active_effect.item_tip: If you want to adjust an Item statistic itself, like with a Weapon, you must disable the Apply Effect to Actor checkbox in the Details tab. An Active Effect can only apply to either an Actor or an Item.
active_effect.more_info: For more information, see the following link:
active_effect.advanced_hint: If checked, you can enter custom System Attribute Keys instead of only the Shadowrun 6E system advised list.

KEYBINDINGS.bindTokenControlGroup: Bind selected Tokens to Control Group
KEYBINDINGS.formGruntGroup: Create Grunt Group with selected Tokens
